product_overview: Lovable is a React and TypeScript based web platform designed to help businesses manage quotes, materials, services, and company profiles efficiently with authentication and dashboard functionalities.
core_goals: Enable secure user authentication and registration.
Provide an intuitive dashboard as the main landing interface.
Facilitate creation, editing, and detailed viewing of business quotes with automatic calculations.
Manage materials and services catalog used in quotes.
Allow management of user profiles and company settings for personalized experience.
key_features: User login and registration for secure access.
Dashboard serving as the main user interface on login.
Comprehensive quote management including new quote creation, editing, and detailed views.
Materials management for maintaining inventory or catalog of materials used in quotes.
Services management to maintain the list of services offered by the company.
Company settings and user profile management for customization of preferences and information.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in to the platform via authentication pages.
Upon login, user lands on the dashboard as the main interface.
User navigates to quote management to create or edit quotes, and view quote details with calculations.
User manages materials and services separately to keep information up to date for quote generation.
User accesses company settings and profile pages to update preferences and personal information.
validation_criteria: User must be able to register and login with valid credentials.
Dashboard must load successfully and display relevant summaries or quick links.
Users can create, edit, and view quotes accurately with all calculations reflecting correct business logic.
Materials and services can be added, edited, and removed correctly and persist changes.
Company settings and user profiles update successfully and persist preferences.
Application UI is responsive, accessible, and maintains consistent styling as per TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui standards.
